Class SciFiName

java.lang.Object
  SciFiName

public class SciFiName
extends java.lang.Object

SciFiName gathers input from a user to generate a custom name that sounds like it could be used in a science fiction book or movie.

Version:
3/4/16
Author:
ckinnard

Method Summary
static void main()
          All input that you privide should be at least three letters long or the program may crash (but feel free to test this!) For best results, user lowercase letters and do not use spaces in your input
